Description:
Used in combat: Strength is dependent on the type of sword.
 The wooden sword does 5 damage on it's own.

Used in combat: Strength is dependent on the type of sword.
 The stone sword does 10 damage on it's own.

Used in combat: Strength is dependent on the type of sword.
 The iron sword does 20 damage on it's own.

A layer of protection that increases the damage needed to be dealt to you in order to lose health.
Leather is the weakest armor.
It gives +20 shield to the player.

A layer of protection that increases the damage needed to be dealt to you in order to lose health.
Chainmail is an okay armor. It gives +30 shield to the player.

A layer of protection that increases the damage needed to be dealt to you in order to lose health.
Iron armor is the strongest armor in the game.
It gives +50 sheild to the player.

Used in combat: Strength is dependent on the type of pickaxe.
A wooden pickaxe does 5 damage

Used in combat: Strength is dependent on the type of pickaxe.
A stone pickaxe does 10 damage

Used in combat: Strength is dependent on the type of pickaxe.
A stone pickaxe does 15 damage
Used in combat: A bow and arrow does 10 damage to the opponent if the attack is successful.

Effect of potions depends on the potion type.
Mutiple health potions can be consumed.

Effect of potions depends on the potion type.
Effects will wear off once the battle is over.
Only one speed potion can be consumed during batle.
Effect: 2x speed during the battle that you are in.
